description: The user uploads an old smartphone launch press release and asks PressMate AI to refresh it using the latest SEO keywords and the company's new style guide. PressMate extracts the event details, fetches the updated style guide, generates SEO keywords, drafts a new release, proofreads it, formats it as HTML, and returns the final brand‑compliant press release ready for distribution.

> *"The X1 represents a major step forward in mobile technology,"* said **Jane Doe**, VP of Product Development at TechCo.
